66158.name: Number of homicide victims among children (0-19) per 100,000 population
66158.description: Number of homicide victims among children aged 0-19 per 100,000
66158.datasetName: Child violence – Ending Violence in Childhood Report (2017)

source.name: Know Violence in Childhood Report (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: Corporal punishment (home): UNICEF global databases, 2016, based on DHS, MICS and other nationally representative surveys, 2005-2015. (2) Bullying and physical fights (school): HBSC, 2009/2010 and GSHS, 2003-2013. (3) Physical and sexual violence against adolescent girls: UNICEF global databases, 2016, based on DHS, MICS and other nationally representative surveys, 2004-2015. (4) Child homicide rate: Data on homicide rates are from World Health Organization, Global Health Estimates (GHE) Summary Tables: Death by cause, age, sex and region, 2012. WHO, Geneva, 2014. (5) Violence against women: United Nations, 2015. The World's Women 2015: Trends and Statistics. New York: United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, Statistics Division. Sales No. E.15.XVII.8, Statistical Annex.
